module.name: twenga
module.description: This module allows you to instantly create an optimized export feed for Twenga and to easily install sales tracking
module.description_full: This module allows you to instantly create an optimized export feed for Twenga and to easily install sales tracking.  Export your products to Twenga in just a few clicks and gain new clients!   Don't wait any longer, sign-up right away!
module.additional_description: Twenga, the shopping guide with 9 years of e-commerce experience helps you to sell efficiently. Gain new clients by downloading the Twenga module.      Twenga is a shopping guide that allows millions of online users to find products at the best price in the online store of their choice.    Twenga's merchant program aims to provide e-retailers with the most qualified traffic, no matter what their business sector may be.    Why should you be listed on Twenga?  Sell more by capturing qualified buyers: 4.5 million unique visitors per month  Manage your budget: payment by CPC only and no minimum commitment period  Follow your activity: a complete and reliable traffic tracking interface    We guarantee:    - Create a product export feed that is optimised for Twenga in just 1 click  - Easily install Twenga's sales tracking: benefit from optimised traffic that is focused on your products with high potential  - Free technical and commercial assistance  - Signing up to the merchant program is free and without a minimum commitment period    More than 15,000 e-retailers in Europe have already joined Twenga's traffic platform.    Don't wait any longer, sign-up right away!   The Twenga merchant programm is available in France, Spain, and Italy.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ebay
module.description: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.description_full: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales.   Create your eBay account now to increase your visibility !
module.additional_description: • You could develop a profitable sales channel using eBay as a new route to market. • Your products will reach a global audience of over a hundred million potential buyers. • You can create listings and sell across both channels from one place. • You’ll be able to manage all of your orders across channels helping to prevent over selling.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: mailjet
module.description: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails
module.description_full: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails. Analyze everything, including opens, clicks and how much revenue each newsletter generates, straight from within your PrestaShop account!   This version of Mailjet’s add-on is compatible with only Mailjet v3 users. If you are a v1 user (any account created before April 2014), please request to get your account migrated via https://www.mailjet.com/support/ticket Discover our brand new user guide : https://www.mailjet.com/guide/prestashop-user-guide/
module.additional_description: With Mailjet, optimise your  deliverability,  get your emails delivered to the inbox and avoid the spam folder. Install the official Mailjet PrestaShop add-on and get access to:   ROI Stats:  Real-time sales and net revenue figures per marketing newsletter. Find out who opened, clicked, bounced or unsubscribed from your mailings, create graphs, export data and much more   Setup triggered email events based on customer behavior (birthday promo, abandoned cart, survey request, …)   Group and create specific customer segments  to send targeted  content to thus increasing engagement and  open rates   Automatically remove unsubscribers from your contact lists and Newsletter list to keep your deliverability reputation intact   Personalize your mailings with any contact list properties   Create & manage all Mailjet campaigns and contacts directly within PrestaShop

module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.   Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Hurry up and try Google AdWords today! Or call 08001690713

module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) emails & SMS. Start now!﻿﻿ With the SendinBlue module, you can find everything you need to easily and efficiently send out email  & SMS campaigns to your prospects and customers.﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿   Enjoy 1-month free trial now with the promo code FREEMERCH14 !
module.additional_description: Both solutions require a fee. Do not hesitate to contact us for a quotation.   High performance have been proven by A/B testingOur patented semantic technology represents the next generation in e-merchandising. It powers the selling strategies that increase sales by 30% through increased conversion and average order value.   Prediggo is a flexible solution that is easy-to-useOur intuitive back-office makes it easy to automate and optimise the most complex merchandising !   Only a few days integration neededPrediggo is the only “complete” solution that does not require integration with your ERP, Cookies or Javascript. Our solutions work on a data export, so they integrate in days, not weeks.    A superior serviceSince we started in 2008, customer service has been one of our core values. So it is no wonder that our customer's have reported a 100% satisfaction rate in our 2012 and 2013 surveys!

module.additional_description: Our modern and intuitive solution allows you to improve your conversion rate with our functions and ergonomics specifically designed for e-commerce. Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales: Quick payment without registration Modern and sleek design Automatic detection of card type

module.description_full: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!   Register now!
module.additional_description: Attractive conditions Easy integration No registration required for your customers Accustomed use of your customers’ familiar online banking details Security thanks to a multi-level online banking authentication procedure Real-time transaction confirmation
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot
module.description_full: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot. Engage the conversation and share your reviews on Google, Facebook, your website and on your public portal!﻿   Beneficiate now from a free trial !
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is the global standard for online trust. Trustpilot enables customer businesses to collect reviews, engage with consumers and share your most powerful marketing asset – real customers’ positive experiences.   Using the Trustpilot Solution to collect and display reviews is one of the most effective ways to build trust, confidence and credibility for your online store.   Trustpilot agreement with Google means that the reviews you collect feed directly into your Google seller rating account.   The power of displaying quality verified reviews in a prominent position through the customer journey via our easy to use widget is undeniable. Displaying reviews on site is proven to decrease shopping cart abandonment, increase basket sizes and most importantly increases sales conversions.   With a few simple steps, Trustpilot simple integration with Prestashop, means in a matter of minutes you too can share your real customer’s great shopping experiences to potential buyers.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ecopresto
module.description: You are starting your retailing business and you are looking for products to sell? Already e-retailer you are looking to add products to your existing catalog without purchasing additional stock?
module.description_full: You are starting your retailing business and you are looking for products to sell? Already e-retailer you are looking to add products to your existing catalog without purchasing additional stock? Ecopresto was built for you!   Ecopresto, leading dropshipping market place, offers access in a few clicks to tens of thousands of references (sport, leisure, beauty, lingerie, accessories, home, garden, wellness).   With the module, focus on your sales, technology is under control. ﻿ For less than 1 euro per day without engagement access our catalog!   Do not wait and contact us by email info@ecopresto.com or phone +33 2 51 44 82 17
module.additional_description: Choose from tens of thousands of products on dropshipping www.ecopresto.com Sell first then pay. Your sale is shipped directly to your customer ... and you sell again!

module.description_full: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back as your Prestashop store has been running.   Sign up now!
module.additional_description: Know what’s happening on your PrestaShop store at any moment, from any device. PrestaStats gives you the power to drive your business to success with an easy to use, clutter free dashboard, that displays your most critical business data, in a visual and consolidated way.

module.description: Increase your sales with personalised recommendations : affinity items automatically displays to each visitor, on each page, the selection of products that best fits his/her tastes & nee
module.description_full: Increase your sales with personalised recommendations : affinity items automatically displays to each visitor, on each page, the selection of products that best fits his/her tastes & needs, for an unrivaled experience. Up to 60% of sales recommended by affinity items.
module.additional_description: Develop your business: better conversion rate, higher average basket, improved customer experience, and more loyal visitors… An important growth lever for your sales! Remain free : no commitment Get a 30 days free trial to state how much relevant and profitable affinity items recommendations are for your business.

module.author: Prestashop

module.name: pigmbhpaymill
module.description: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions
module.description_full: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions.                                                                   Register your PAYMILL account  for free now!
module.additional_description: Integrating PAYMILL is a breeze, simply download the module to install and follow the steps  to sign up. Give your customers the flexibility of paying in a selection of payment methods, which includes all the major credit and debit cards   Your Payments Secured With our Level-1 PCI Compliance we’ve got you covered with the highest security and data protection standards. Making it even faster for you to start accepting online payments.   Accept Payments Worldwide Reach a global market by accepting payments from around the world and in up to 100 different currencies.   One-Click Checkout Save your customer’s time by letting them store their payment information securely on our servers for future purchases. All they need to do is click to buy!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue
module.description_full: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue. The claim is resolved in a couple of clicks, time is saved and customer’s loyalty increased.
module.additional_description: Youstice is a new-generation multilingual online tool, delivering fast and fair solutions to customer complaints all over the world. It helps companies seamlessly communicate and handle claims - both within countries and cross-border.   Through Youstice, in just a couple of clicks, both sides can communicate and negotiate directly, getting issues resolved within minutes. The process is standardized, automated and sophisticated, as it provides options for a constructive dialogue between the consumer and retailer. If no agreement can be reached, Youstice offers the option to have the complaint reviewed by a neutral third-party professional, by mutual agreement, for a quick and fair decision.   By resolving complaints rapidly and fairly retailers become trusted sellers, gain loyal customers, prevent negative feedback and make clients more engaged.   Watch our video and visit our website for more information.   Benefits Connect with your customers and increase their loyalty – thanks to a personalized approach to customer complaints You save time- solving a complaint takes just a couple of clicks You minimize negative reviews and prevent customers from posting future ones by resolving their complaints quickly and efficiently You get help with international expansion – you will get an access to our ecosystem of interconnected online markets, consumer organizations, trustmarks and ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) providers
module.author: Prestashop

module.description_full: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone. Partners with many Banks and International acquirers, Klik & Pay assists its merchants for 15 years, in France, Europe and all over the World. Whatever your industry, we have a solution for you:   Create an account and start receiving payments now
module.additional_description: No start-up fees or monthly subscription Only 1.45% and 0.3 € per transaction A team available to help you secure your transactions and increase your conversion rate. Check out the below video configuration and start receiving payments!

module.additional_description: When it comes to added professionalism for the management of your client and supplier orders, advanced configuration of your supplier forms, or even managing and exporting your stock and running your inventory, the 1-Click ERP pack will be your preferred assistant to help you manage your store in a simple, efficient way! module.name: nostotagging
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey.
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rate and average order value by delivering your customers personalized product recommendations throughout their shopping journey. Nosto allows you to deliver every customer a personalized shopping experience through recommendations based on their unique user behavior - increasing conversion, average order value and customer retention as a result. Nosto’s offering for PrestaShop merchants is unique: it's extremely easy setup and real-time product recommendations are unlike anything PrestaShop merchants have had access to before. You only need give the module a few days to learn the user behavior on your site. Our pricing model scales as you do. With no minimum spend or commitments, we tie our success to yours, taking only a small % of the revenue we help you generate. Install Nosto for FREE in minutes, and join over 4000 retailers across the globe using Nosto to grow their business and delight their customers!   Increase Online Sales and enable customers to enjoy online shopping! Increase Average Order Value with Cross- and Up-sell recommendations Boost Conversion Rate with relevant product recommendations Learn more about your customers through a real-time dashboard view Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.description: First Marketing module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 10,000 free emails per month i.e
module.description_full: First Marketing module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 10,000 free emails per month i.e. 400 per day, and the possibility to send FAX and SMS at very low prices.
module.additional_description: With more than 12 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ovhhosting
module.description: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7
module.description_full: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders
module.description_full: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders. Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: gapps
module.description: Google Apps for Work is a cloud-based productivity suite which can help you work from anywhere, on any device. Get professional email, online storage, shared calendars, video meetings and more
module.description_full: Google Apps for Work is a cloud-based productivity suite which can help you work from anywhere, on any device. Get professional email, online storage, shared calendars, video meetings and more. Try Google Apps Free for 30 days by Downloading the Module and getting a coupon code
module.additional_description: Gmail Get professional business email with Google-powered search, up to 30GB of storage, offline support, spam protection, integrated video meetings and much more.  Calendar Arrange meetings at times that work for everyone, respond to invitations from your inbox, stay on schedule with event reminders and access your calendars offline.  Drive Store your files securely online, access them from anywhere, export with ease and always know you have the latest version.  Hangouts Launch and join video meetings, group chats and voice conversations from your laptop, tablet or phone.  SheetsCo-edit spreadsheets from any location or device, view revision history with a simple click and exchanging feedback through discussion-style comments.  Slides Craft professional presentations through real-time teamwork, and enhance them with videos, images, drawings and transitions.  Sites Build an intranet for your company, a project site for your team or a portal for customers without writing a single line of code.  Docs Create, share and edit documents with your whole team in real time, without ever having to click save.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: chronopost
module.description: A comprehensive range of services from the express delivery leader are now available for home deliveries !
module.description_full: A comprehensive range of services from the express delivery leader are now available for home deliveries !
